titleStmt.title: John Boyle to W. B. Skaggs
CWG14147

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p:
109
Oct. 6th 3
Capt. W. B. Skaggs,
Gradysville -- Ky.
Sir,
Your letter to Gov. Bramlette has been referred to this office -- and in answer I enclose you the State Guard Law, and the order issued from this Department.
Companies will be organized under this Law -- and will be called into service only when the governor may deem it necessary.

Respectfully
Your obt serv't
John Boyle
Adjt. Gen of Ky
